name: Acoustic Emission Testing System
description: Acoustic Emission testing system detects transient elastic waves generated by crack initiation and material deformation.

name: Aggregate Impact Tester
description: Aggregate Impact Tester determines the resistance of aggregates to sudden impact, expressed as Aggregate Impact Value (AIV).

name: Air Permeability (Blaine Apparatus)
description: Blaine Air Permeability Apparatus determines the fineness of Portland cement by measuring the specific surface area.

name: Compression Testing Machine
description: High-capacity compression testing machine designed for testing concrete cubes and cylinders to failure.

name: Climatic Test Chamber
description: Climatic Test Chamber for simulating temperature and humidity conditions to test material durability and stability.

name: Accelerated Curing Tank
description: Accelerated Curing Tank is used to determine early compressive strength of concrete by accelerating hydration through controlled hot water curing, enabling prediction of 28-day strength within a short time.

specifications.Capacity: 6 to 72 cube moulds depending on model

functionality: Quality control of cement and concrete

name: Air Entrainment Meter
description: Type B Air Entrainment Meter measures the air content of fresh concrete using the pressure method.

specifications.Construction: Aluminum alloy bowl with pressure gauge

functionality: Measurement of air content in fresh concrete

name: Buoyancy Balance
description: Buoyancy Balance is used to determine density, specific gravity, and water absorption of hardened concrete using hydrostatic weighing.

name: Pull-Off Tester
description: Pull-Off Tester measures tensile bond strength of coatings and concrete surfaces by applying controlled hydraulic pull-off force.

name: Resipod Resistivity Meter
description: Resipod measures electrical resistivity of concrete to assess durability, permeability, and corrosion risk.

name: Vibrating Machine
description: Vibrating Machine is used to compact cement mortar and concrete specimens uniformly for strength testing.

name: Ultrasonic Pulse Velocity (UPV)
description: UPV testing determines quality and integrity of concrete by measuring the velocity of ultrasonic pulses passing through the material.

name: Slump Test Apparatus
description: Slump Test Apparatus is used to determine the workability and consistency of fresh concrete.
functionality: Quality control at site and lab

name: Three Hinged Arch Apparatus
description: Three Hinged Arch Apparatus is used in structural engineering labs to study horizontal thrust, reactions, and influence lines.

name: U-Box Test Apparatus
description: U-Box Test Apparatus evaluates the filling and passing ability of self-compacting concrete.

name: Universal Testing Machine
description: Universal Testing Machine performs tensile, compressive, and bending tests on materials.

name: Vee-Bee Consistometer
description: Vee-Bee Consistometer measures the consistency of stiff concrete by vibration time.

name: V-Funnel Test Apparatus
description: V-Funnel Test Apparatus determines the flowability of self-compacting concrete by measuring flow time.

name: Vibrating Table
description: Vibrating Table is used for proper compaction of concrete specimens during casting.

name: Vicat Apparatus
description: Vicat Apparatus is used to determine standard consistency, initial setting time, and final setting time of cement.
functionality: Initial and final setting time measurement

name: Column Apparatus
description: Column Test Apparatus designed for studying the buckling behavior of columns under various end conditions.
manufacturer: Jinan Should Shine Didactic Equipment Co., Ltd.

name: Deflection of Beam Apparatus
description: Deflection of Beam Apparatus for investigating the deflection and bending stress in beams under different loads and support conditions.

name: Fatigue Testing Machine
description: Servo-hydraulic fatigue testing machine used for cyclic loading, fracture toughness, and low-cycle fatigue testing of materials.

name: Gas-Gun Setup for Impact Loading
description: Gas-Gun setup is used for medium to high velocity impact testing of polymer and concrete specimens as per ASTM standards.

name: Humidity / Environmental Chamber
description: Environmental chamber used for controlled temperature and humidity conditioning of materials and specimens.

name: IDS GeoRadar â€“ Stream DP
description: Stream DP is a multi-channel 3D Ground Penetrating Radar system used for underground utility mapping and subsurface investigation.

name: Motorised Sieve Shaker
description: Motorised Sieve Shaker is used for particle size distribution analysis of aggregates and soils by mechanical sieving.

name: Rebound Hammer
description: Rebound Hammer is a non-destructive testing device used to estimate in-situ compressive strength of concrete.

name: Deflection of Truss Apparatus
description: The Deflection of Truss Apparatus is used to experimentally study horizontal and vertical deflections of truss joints under applied loads and compare theoretical and experimental results.

name: Portal Frame Apparatus
description: Portal Frame Apparatus is used to study the behavior of statically indeterminate portal frames under horizontal and vertical loads.

name: Profometer (Cover Meter & Corrosion)
description: The Profometer is a non-destructive testing instrument used to locate reinforcement bars, measure concrete cover, and assess corrosion probability using electromagnetic pulse induction.

name: Suspension Bridge Apparatus
description: The Suspension Bridge Apparatus demonstrates load transfer mechanisms in suspension bridges and compares experimental results with simplified theory.

name: Corrosion Analyser
description: The Corrosion Analyser uses galvanostatic pulse techniques to assess corrosion activity of reinforcement in concrete structures.

name: L-Box Apparatus
description: L-Box Test Apparatus determines the passing ability and flow of self-compacting concrete (SCC) through reinforced sections.

name: Low Velocity Impact Testing Machine
description: Low Velocity Impact Testing Machine evaluates the impact resistance and energy absorption of concrete and polymer specimens.

name: Two Hinged Arch Apparatus
description: Two Hinged Arch Apparatus demonstrates the behavior of indeterminate structures and horizontal thrust components.
